research interest: Development of high-index-contrast planar lightwave circuits to densely integrate photonic signal processing components onto a single, robust solid-state chip for photonics and RF applications.
Development of portable system that is highly sensitive, real time, in-situ, has label- and reagent-free transduction,and is capable of multiplexed measurements.
